thread.title: Mona Hassan

author: Mona Hassan
title: Mona Hassan
text: I bought a package of 6 touch ups for a small area in Costa Mesa. I was told when I purchased the package I can touch up any one small area that needs touching up. The girl in Brea wouldn't allow me to. She said I have to use it for one 1 area. However I already got all my small area done and just need touching up once in a while. However the nurse who did my laser hair what AMAZING! She was very patient and made my appt fun. She kept my mind of any pain. Thank you for have such great nu
